Not perfect, but you could do something like this
```using Plots
red = [1, 3]
green = [0.5, 1.5]
blue = [1, 2, missing, 2.5, 3]
plot(legend = false, grid = false)
plot!(red, fill(3, length(red)), c = :red, linewidth = 20)
plot!(green, fill(2, length(green)), c = :green, linewidth = 20)
plot!([1, 2, missing, 2.5, 3], fill(1, length(blue)), c = :blue, linewidth = 20)
yticks!(1:3, ["m1", "m2", "m3"])
xticks!(1:3, ["f1", "f2", "f3"])```
